data.name: Gather
data.desc: A real-time team collaboration platform with chat, file sharing, and notifications powered by Spring Boot and WebSockets.

data.name: Protrackr
data.desc: A TRPC-powered issue tracking system for teams to manage tasks, deadlines, and workflows with role-based access.

data.name: Daily Audio News
data.desc: A daily audio news platform that provides a summary of the news of the day.

data.name: Stock Portfolio Management System
data.desc: A Java Swing desktop app for creating and managing stock portfolios with value tracking and transaction logging.

data.name: MovieBuzz
data.desc: A full-stack movie platform for exploring films, writing reviews, and managing content with role-based access.

data.name: SoundBoom
data.desc: A MERN stack e-commerce platform for audio gear with Stripe payments and Redux-powered cart management.

data.name: Job Linker
data.desc: A job portal connecting seekers and employers with resume uploads and job postings using Supabase and Framer Motion.

data.name: Airglobe
data.desc: An Airbnb clone built with MERN stack featuring property bookings, host listings, and Cloudinary image uploads.

data.name: Pothole Detection System
data.desc: An AI-powered system using CNN and VGG-16 models to detect potholes with 93% accuracy and ArcGIS integration.
